comments.content:
I appended -Dtests.dups=20 to the seed, and it failed twice!

So i think maybe the test is becoming more reproducible
comments.author: Robert Muir

comments.content:
here's a hack (i dont think its correct) for these failures showing where the problem is.

the issue is the deleteAll() added to the test: we hit exception in an rld.dropReaders (e.g. closing the segmentreader) during dropAll and it stops the loop.
comments.author: Robert Muir

comments.content:
Patch, going back to .deleteAll and also adding a .tryDeleteDocument, and fixing a few places that weren't handling the IE correctly... it seems to pass in my local beasting!

But I expect every time we make this test more evil we'll uncover more exception handling bugs ...
